item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:15 Chances: Snap expands generative AI capabilities with ‘Dreams’ feature, signaling innovation. Snap’s announcement of new safety measures and compliance with EU’s DSA is positive. Strategic appointments and growth plans in India may contribute to future success. Snap’s focus on augmented reality and VR, as indicated by its ranking among biggest AR and VR companies.
